metadata.title: USN-3877-1 -- LibVNCServer vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that LibVNCServer incorrectly handled certain operations. A remote attacker able to connect to applications using LibVNCServer could possibly use this issue to obtain sensitive information, cause a denial of service, or execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3877-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libvncclient1 - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.3 libvncserver-config - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.3 libvncserver1 - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.3 libvncserver-dev - 0.9.10+dfsg-3ubuntu0.16.04.3 No subscription required
